metadata.description: Based on Tales From Deep Space, the new action-adventure platformer from Amazon Games,  and featuring the game's protagonist, the affable spacefaring salesman E, comes "Lox of Luck", an official TFDS prequel story chock full of bombastic shenanigans and wacky characters, just like those that inhabit the game.  Written by Tom Waltz (Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles) and illustrated by Ciro Cangialosi (Monkey Island).
metadata.name: Tales From Deep Space
